traits.description: Damage you deal reduces enemy damage by 25% for 2.5 seconds.
traits.name: Resolve
traits.simpleDescription: "It is not our place to make demands of nature, nor to acquiesce to those who would. First we learn what is right, then we protect what is right." —Master Wughan

traits.description: While dual-wielding, you gain a 15% chance to dodge incoming attacks. While using a two-handed weapon, all Spirit generation is increased by 25%.
traits.name: The Guardian's Path
traits.simpleDescription: "No weapon can overcome the weakness of an undisciplined mind. They can only serve as an extension of the self." —Waykeeper Tzo Krin

traits.name: Fleet Footed
traits.simpleDescription: Strength out of place is no strength at all.

traits.description: Every point of Spirit spent heals you for 118.6 Life.
traits.name: Transcendence
traits.simpleDescription: A life unlived is no different than death.

traits.description: Duration of all Mantras increased by 7 minutes. While one of your Mantras is active you gain 2 Spirit every second.
traits.name: Chant of Resonance
traits.simpleDescription: The world continues on the noble path, each of us carrying another, all connected, ever onward.

traits.description: Your Armor is increased by 100% of your Dexterity.
traits.name: Seize the Initiative
traits.simpleDescription: The Monks of Ivgorod are trained to move like water—flowing freely into open spaces and crashing hard against their foes.

traits.description:
Increases maximum Spirit by 100.

Spirit fuels your defensive and offensive abilities.
traits.name: Exalted Soul
traits.simpleDescription: "Endeavor to be one with the hidden truth and you will soar beyond the sky." —Waykeeper Tzo Krin

traits.description: Your dodge chance is increased by an amount equal to 30% of your chance to critical hit.
traits.name: Sixth Sense
traits.simpleDescription: The final test of the Serpent's Form takes place in "The Pit of 12 Vipers." The initiates are not told about the 13th.

traits.description: While stunned, feared or charmed, all damage taken is reduced by 75%.
traits.name: Pacifism
traits.simpleDescription: Ascetic practices require initiates to go without food, water and sleep for months at a time. Those who survive emerge unmoved by the petty distractions of the physical world.

traits.description:
When receiving fatal damage, you are instead restored to 35% of maximum Life and 35% Spirit.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 90 seconds.
traits.name: Near Death Experience
traits.simpleDescription: "We do not see what has been done, we only see what remains to be done." —Mantra of the Monks of Ivgorod

traits.description: Whenever you use a direct heal skill on another player you and the other player deal 16% more damage for 15 seconds.
traits.name: Guiding Light
traits.simpleDescription: "I thought I was done for, trampled into the snow. Suddenly I felt her hand on my shoulder. The warmth returned to my bones, and together we repelled the beasts." —Legends of the North

traits.description: Your resistance to all elements is equal to your highest elemental resistance.
traits.name: One With Everything
traits.simpleDescription: Ice hunters brave months of frozen darkness. Desert traders bear relentless, scorching sun. This world is ours to endure.

traits.description: Each different Spirit Generator ability you use increases your damage by 8% for 3 seconds.
traits.name: Combination Strike
traits.simpleDescription: Master Wughan was not merely the first to perfect the six techniques. His true accomplishment was in weaving them into a style all his own.

runes.name: Bounding Light
runes.description: Every third punch releases chain lighting instead of knocking enemies back. Each lightning strike inflicts 67% weapon damage as Lightning.
runes.simpleDescription: Every third punch releases chain lightning instead of causing Knockback.

runes.name: Lightning Flash
runes.description: Fists of Thunder increases your Dodge chance by 16% for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Fists of Thunder increases your chance to Dodge.

runes.name: Static Charge
runes.description: Your primary target is charged with static for 5 seconds. Enemies with a static charge take 35% weapon damage as Lightning when you attack other nearby enemies with Fists of Thunder.
runes.simpleDescription: Your target is charged with static electricity and takes additional damage when nearby enemies are hit by Fists of Thunder.

runes.name: Quickening
runes.description: Critical Hits generate an additional 15 Spirit.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical Hits generate Spirit.

runes.name: Thunderclap
runes.description: Teleport to the target and releases an electric shockwave with each punch that hits all enemies within 6 yards of your primary target for 35% weapon damage as Lightning.
runes.simpleDescription: Teleport to the target and release an electric shockwave with every punch.

skills.name: Fists of Thunder
skills.description:
Generate: 6 Spirit per attack

Unleash a series of extremely fast punches that deal 100% weapon damage as Lightning. Every third hit deals damage to all enemies in front of you and knocks them back a short distance. Generates Spirit faster than other Spirit Generators due to the high attack speed.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 6 Spirit per attack

Attack a single target with a series of rapid punches that can Knockback enemies.

runes.name: Way of the Falling Star
runes.description: Increase your movement speed by 25% for 3 seconds after striking an enemy.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase your movement speed after striking an enemy.

runes.name: Flying Side Kick
runes.description: Perform a flying kick that has a 50% chance to stun your target for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Perform a flying kick that has a chance to Stun its target.

runes.name: Quicksilver
runes.description: The cost of Dashing Strike is reduced to 10 Spirit.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the Spirit cost of Dashing Strike.

runes.name: Soaring Skull
runes.description: Launch yourself through the air and slow all enemies along your path by 60% for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Launch yourself through the air and Slow all enemies along your path.

runes.name: Blinding Speed
runes.description: Receive a 20% increased chance to dodge for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase your chance to Dodge when using Dashing Strike.

skills.name: Dashing Strike
skills.description:
Cost: 15 Spirit

Dash quickly at the targeted enemy or location, dealing 80% weapon damage and rooting the target for 1 second.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 15 Spirit

Quickly dash and strike an enemy.

runes.name: Piercing Trident
runes.description: The second and third strike of the skill have an increased area of effect.
runes.simpleDescription: The second and third strikes have an increased area of effect.

runes.name: Keen Eye
runes.description: The third strike of Deadly Reach increases the armor of the Monk by 50% for 4 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: The third strike of Deadly Reach increases your Armor for a limited time.

runes.name: Scattered Blows
runes.description: The third strike is replaced with an attack that will hit up to 6 nearby enemies within 15 yards for 150% weapon damage as Lightning.
runes.simpleDescription: The third strike randomly hits multiple enemies with Lightning.

runes.name: Strike from Beyond
runes.description: Critical hits with this skill generate 10 Spirit.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical Hits generate Spirit.

runes.name: Foresight
runes.description: The third strike of Deadly Reach increases the damage of all attacks by 18% for 30 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: The third strike of Deadly Reach increases the damage of all attacks.

skills.name: Deadly Reach
skills.description:
Generate: 6 Spirit per attack

Project lines of pure force over a short distance for 100% weapon damage. Every third hit extends out 25 yards.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 6 Spirit per attack

Strike multiple enemies in a row with each attack.

runes.name: Self Reflection
runes.description: Increases the duration enemies are blinded to 4 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the duration enemies are Blind.

runes.name: Blind and Confused
runes.description: Blinded enemies have a 25% chance to attack each other.
runes.simpleDescription: Blind enemies have a chance to attack each other.

runes.name: Blinding Echo
runes.description: 6 seconds after using Blinding Flash, a second flash of light will blind enemies within 20 yards for 0.5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: A second flash Blinds all nearby enemies.

runes.name: Searing Light
runes.description: Increases the chance Elite monsters will miss attacks to 60%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the chance Blind enemies will miss when attacking.

runes.name: Faith in the Light
runes.description: For 3 seconds after using Blinding Flash, all of your attacks are infused to deal 30% additional weapon damage as Holy.
runes.simpleDescription: After using Blinding Flash, all of your attacks deal extra damage for a limited time.

skills.name: Blinding Flash
skills.description:
Cost: 10 Spirit
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Create a flash of light that blinds all enemies within 20 yards for 3 seconds. Elite monsters will recover early but will suffer a 30% chance to miss with attacks.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 10 Spirit
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Blind all nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Vulture Claw Kick
runes.description: With a torrent of fire, strike all nearby enemies for 220% weapon damage as Fire and knock them back.
runes.simpleDescription: Release a torrent of fire that burns nearby enemies and causes Knockback.

runes.name: Sweeping Armada
runes.description: All enemies around you are knocked back 150% farther and have their movement slowed by 60% for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: All enemies around you are knocked back farther and have their movement slowed.

runes.name: Spinning Flame Kick
runes.description: Hurl a column of fire that pierces through enemies, causing 240% weapon damage as Fire to each enemy it strikes.
runes.simpleDescription: Hurl a column of fire that that burns enemies in its path.

runes.name: Scorpion Sting
runes.description: Instead of knocking enemies back, affected enemies are stunned for 1.0 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Stun instead of causing Knockback.

runes.name: Hand of Ytar
runes.description: Attack enemies at long range and slow the movement speed of affected targets by 80% for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Attack enemies at range and Slow all enemies hit by the Hand of Ytar.

skills.name: Lashing Tail Kick
skills.description:
Cost: 30 Spirit

Unleash a deadly roundhouse kick, knocking enemies back and dealing 200% weapon damage.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 30 Spirit

A deadly roundhouse kick that is good against small groups of enemies.

runes.name: Circle of Scorn
runes.description: Breath of Heaven also sears enemies for 80% weapon damage as Holy.
runes.simpleDescription: Breath of Heaven deals Holy damage to enemies.

runes.name: Circle of Life
runes.description: Increases the healing to 20047 - 26216 Life.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the healing power of Breath of Heaven.

runes.name: Blazing Wrath
runes.description: Breath of Heaven increases the damage of all your attacks by 15% for 45 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Breath of Heaven increases the damage of all your attacks for a limited time.

runes.name: Infused with Light
runes.description: Gain 6 additional Spirit from Spirit generator attacks for 5 seconds after using Breath of Heaven.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain additional Spirit from Spirit generator attacks for a limited time.

runes.name: Penitent Flame
runes.description: Enemies exposed to Breath of Heaven run away in fear for 1.5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies exposed to Breath of Heaven run away in Fear.

skills.name: Breath of Heaven
skills.description:
Cost: 25 Spirit
Cooldown: 15 seconds

A blast of holy energy heals you and all allies within 12 yards for 15421 - 20166 Life.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Spirit
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Heal yourself and nearby allies.

runes.name: Hard Target
runes.description: Mantra of Evasion also grants an increase in armor by 30%.
runes.simpleDescription: Mantra of Evasion grants an Armor bonus.

runes.name: Divine Protection
runes.description: Each target can be protected at most once every 90 seconds by this effect.
runes.simpleDescription: When you or an ally are close to death, a shield of protection forms around you, reducing incoming damage.

runes.name: Wind Through the Reeds
runes.description: Mantra of Evasion also grants an increase in movement speed by 5%.
runes.simpleDescription: Mantra of Evasion increases your movement speed.

runes.name: Perseverance
runes.description: Mantra of Evasion also reduces the duration of all control impairing effects by 20%.
runes.simpleDescription: Mantra of Evasion reduces the duration of all control impairing effects like Slow or Frozen.

runes.name: Backlash
runes.description: Successfully dodging an attack has a chance to create a burst of flame dealing 35% weapon damage as Fire to all nearby enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: Successfully dodging an attack has a chance to create a burst of flame that damages nearby enemies.

skills.name: Mantra of Evasion
skills.description:
Cost: 25 Spirit

Recite a Mantra that grants you and all allies within 40 yards a 15% chance to dodge attacks. Lasts 3 minutes.

For 3 seconds after activation, a second effect grants an additional 15% chance to dodge attacks.

This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Spirit

Increases your and your allies' chance to dodge attacks.

Only one Mantra can be active at a time.

runes.name: The Flesh is Weak
runes.description: The third hit also causes the target to take 12% additional damage for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: The third hit causes the target to take additional damage.

runes.name: Strong Spirit
runes.description: If the target explodes after bleeding, gain 5 Spirit for each enemy caught in the blast.
runes.simpleDescription: If the target explodes after bleeding, gain Spirit for each enemy caught in the blast.

runes.name: Creeping Demise
runes.description: The bleed effect hits 2 targets standing in front of you.
runes.simpleDescription: Bleed multiple enemies in front of you.

runes.name: Impending Doom
runes.description: Increases the duration of the bleed effect to 5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the duration of the Bleed effect.

runes.name: Essence Burn
runes.description: The third strike causes the target to burn for 60% weapon damage as Fire every second for 3 seconds. If the target dies while burning it explodes causing all nearby enemies to burn for 30% weapon damage as Fire for 2 seconds. This effect can chain repeatedly.
runes.simpleDescription: The third strike causes the target to burn. If the target dies while burning, it explodes and damages nearby enemies.

skills.name: Exploding Palm
skills.description:
Generate: 6 Spirit per attack

The first two strikes in the attack deal 100% weapon damage. The third strike causes the target to bleed for 50% of weapon damage as Physical per second for 3 seconds. If the target dies while bleeding, it explodes and deals 30% of the target's maximum Life as Physical damage to all other enemies nearby.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 6 Spirit per attack

Strike and Bleed an enemy. The enemy will explode if killed while bleeding.

runes.name: Northern Breeze
runes.description: Reduces channeling cost to 10 Spirit.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduces the Spirit cost of Tempest Rush.

runes.name: Tailwind
runes.description: Increases the movement speed of Tempest Rush by 25%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the movement bonus of Tempest Rush.

runes.name: Flurry
runes.description: Increases the potency of the hobbling effect, slowing enemy movement by 80%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases amount Tempest Rush Slows enemies.

runes.name: Slipstream
runes.description: Reduce the damage taken while running by 25%.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the damage taken while running.

runes.name: Bluster
runes.description: Enemies knocked back have their damage reduced by 20% for the duration of the effect.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies knocked back have their damage reduced.

skills.name: Tempest Rush
skills.description:
Cost: 15 Spirit plus an additional 15 Spirit while channeling

Run directly through your enemies, knocking them back and hobbling them, slowing their movement by 60% for 2 seconds. Also deals 50% weapon damage while running.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 30 Spirit

Run through your enemies, damaging and knocking them back.

runes.name: Mangle
runes.description: Increase damage to 130% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase damage of Crippling Wave.

runes.name: Concussion
runes.description: Enemies hit by Crippling Wave inflict 20% less damage for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies hit by Crippling Wave deal less damage for a limited time.

runes.name: Rising Tide
runes.description: Critical Hits generates 5 Spirit.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical Hits generate Spirit when using Crippling Wave.

runes.name: Tsunami
runes.description: The range of Crippling Wave's third strike is increased to 17 yards and the effect of the movement speed reduction is increased to 60%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the range and movement speed reduction of the third attack using Crippling Wave.

runes.name: Breaking Wave
runes.description: Enemies hit by Crippling Wave take 10% additional damage from all attacks for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies hit by Crippling Wave take additional damage for a limited time.

skills.name: Crippling Wave
skills.description:
Generate: 6 Spirit per attack

A series of large sweeping attacks that causes 100% weapon damage to all enemies in front of you. Every third hit damages all enemies around you and dazes them, slowing movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 6 Spirit per attack

Sweeping punches that cripple enemies, reducing their attack and movement speed.

runes.name: Retaliation
runes.description: Increase amount of damage reflected by the Mantra to 60%. The Mantra will now reflect ranged damage as well as melee damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase amount of damage reflected by the Mantra and reflects ranged weapons as well.

runes.name: Transgression
runes.description: Mantra of Retribution also increases attack speed for you and all allies by 8%.
runes.simpleDescription: Mantra of Retribution increases your attack speed for you and all allies.

runes.name: Indignation
runes.description: When taking damage from the Mantra of Retribution, enemies have a 20% chance to be stunned for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Mantra of Retribution has a chance to Stun enemies.

runes.name: Against All Odds
runes.description: Mantra of Retribution has a chance to restore 3 Spirit when reflecting damage done to you.
runes.simpleDescription: When redirecting damage, the Mantra of Retribution has a chance to restore Spirit.

runes.name: Collateral Damage
runes.description: An attacker that triggers Mantra of Retribution has up to a 30% chance to suffer a feedback blast, dealing 45% weapon damage as Holy to itself and surrounding enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies damaged by the Mantra of Retribution have a chance to burst and deal Holy damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Mantra of Retribution
skills.description:
Cost: 25 Spirit

Recite a Mantra that causes you and all allies within 40 yards to reflect melee damage back at enemies, dealing Holy damage equal to 40% of the damage sustained. Lasts 3 minutes.

For 3 seconds after activation the effect on you is increased to 80% of the damage sustained.

This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Spirit

Enemies take damage when they attack you or your allies using melee weapons.

Only one Mantra can be active at a time.

runes.name: Peaceful Repose
runes.description: When activated, Serenity heals you for 35587 - 41518 Life.
runes.simpleDescription: When activated, Serenity heals you as well.

runes.name: Reap What Is Sown
runes.description: Unleash an explosion equal to 30% of the damage avoided by Serenity when Serenity expires, dealing Holy damage to enemies within 20 yards. The damage to each enemy cannot exceed 100% of your maximum Life.
runes.simpleDescription: When Serenity expires, unleash an explosion dealing a portion of the absorbed damage back at attackers.

runes.name: Tranquility
runes.description: Extends the protective shield and immunity to control impairing effects to allies within 45 yards for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Extends the protective shield to your allies and makes them immune to control impairing effects like Slow and Frozen.

runes.name: Ascension
runes.description: Increases the duration of Serenity to 5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the duration of Serenity.

runes.name: Instant Karma
runes.description: While Serenity is active, 50% of all projectiles and melee attacks are reflected back at the attacker.
runes.simpleDescription: While Serenity is active all projectiles and melee attacks are reflected back at the attacker.

skills.name: Serenity
skills.description:
Cost: 10 Spirit
Cooldown: 45 seconds

You are enveloped in a protective shield that absorbs all incoming damage for 3 seconds and grants immunity to all control impairing effects.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 10 Spirit
Cooldown: 45 seconds

Become immune to all attacks for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Sudden Assault
runes.description: Teleport to the target and increases damage done to 1007% weapon damage over 7 hits.
runes.simpleDescription: Teleport to the target and increase the damage per hit.

runes.name: Several Sided Strike
runes.description: Increases the number of strikes made to 9 attacks.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the number of strikes.

runes.name: Pandemonium
runes.description: Enemies hit by the barrage have a 25% chance per hit to be charmed or stunned for 7 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies hit by the Seven-Sided Strike have a chance to be Charmed or Stunned.

runes.name: Sustained Attack
runes.description: Reduces the cooldown of Seven-Sided Strike by 7 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Seven-Sided Strike.

runes.name: Fulminating Onslaught
runes.description: Each impact explodes to deal Holy damage in a 7 yard radius around the target.
runes.simpleDescription: Each strike triggers an explosion that deals Holy damage.

skills.name: Seven-Sided Strike
skills.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Dash rapidly between nearby enemies dealing 777% weapon damage over 7 hits.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Move with blinding speed and strike all nearby enemies while being immune to attacks yourself.

runes.name: Wall of Light
runes.description: Increases damage of the initial impact to 240% weapon damage as Holy.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases damage of the initial impact.

runes.name: Explosive Light
runes.description: Shoot out bursts of energy that deal 330% weapon damage as Holy to nearby enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: Release bursts of energy that deal Holy damage to enemies.

runes.name: Empowered Wave
runes.description: Cost reduced to 60 Spirit.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the Spirit cost of Wave of Light.

runes.name: Blinding Light
runes.description: Critical hits stun enemies for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical Hits Stun enemies.

runes.name: Pillar of the Ancients
runes.description: Summon an ancient pillar that deals 240% weapon damage followed by an additional 240% weapon damage after 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon an ancient pillar that crushes nearby enemies.

skills.name: Wave of Light
skills.description:
Cost: 100 Spirit

Focuses the power of Light to smite enemies for 150% weapon damage as Holy followed by an additional 150% weapon damage as Holy to all enemies in a line.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 100 Spirit

Ring a mystic bell to unleash a wave of light that crushes all enemies in its path.

runes.name: Sustenance
runes.description: Increases the Life regeneration granted by Mantra of Healing to 1186 Life per second.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase Mantra of Healing's Life regeneration.

runes.name: Circular Breathing
runes.description: Mantra of Healing also grants you 3 Spirit per second.
runes.simpleDescription: Mantra of Healing regenerates Spirit.

runes.name: Boon of Protection
runes.description: Mantra of Healing shrouds you and your allies with a mystical shield for 1 seconds that absorbs up to 10% of each person's maximum Life in damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Mantra of Healing shrouds you and your allies with a mystical shield that absorbs damage.

runes.name: Heavenly Body
runes.description: Mantra of Healing also increases Vitality by 10%.
runes.simpleDescription: Mantra of Healing also increases Vitality.

runes.name: Time of Need
runes.description: Mantra of Healing also increases all resistances by 20%.
runes.simpleDescription: Mantra of Healing also increases resistances to all damage types.

skills.name: Mantra of Healing
skills.description:
Cost: 25 Spirit

Recite a Mantra that causes you and all allies within 40 yards to gain increased Life regeneration by 593 Life per second. Lasts 3 minutes.

For 3 seconds after activation the effect is increased to 2372.5 Life per second.

This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Spirit

Increases Life regeneration for you and your allies.

Only one Mantra can be active at a time.

runes.name: Safe Haven
runes.description: You and all allies regenerate 2966 Life per second while inside the circle.
runes.simpleDescription: You and your allies regenerate Life inside the Sanctuary.

runes.name: Sanctified Ground
runes.description: When Inner Sanctuary expires it becomes Sanctified Ground for 6 seconds, slowing the movement of all enemies on it by 60%.
runes.simpleDescription: When Inner Sanctuary expires it becomes Sanctified Ground slowing enemies that move through it.

runes.name: Consecration
runes.description: Increase the duration of Inner Sanctuary to 8 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the duration of Inner Sanctuary.

runes.name: Circle of Protection
runes.description: Allies, including yourself, standing in the area of effect of Inner Sanctuary take 35% less damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Allies, including yourself, in the Inner Sanctuary take less damage.

runes.name: Forbidden Palace
runes.description: Enemies within the area of effect of Inner Sanctuary when it is activated take 150% weapon damage as Holy.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies within the Inner Sanctuary take Holy damage.

skills.name: Inner Sanctuary
skills.description:
Cost: 30 Spirit
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Create a circle of protection on the ground for 6 seconds that cannot be passed by enemies.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 30 Spirit
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Create a runic circle that enemies cannot enter.

runes.name: Blade Storm
runes.description: Intensify the vortex, increasing the damage per stack to 25% weapon damage. This increases the damage with 3 stacks to 75% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Intensify the vortex, increasing the damage of Sweeping Wind.

runes.name: Fire Storm
runes.description: Increases the radius of the vortex to 14 yards and modifies the damage dealt to Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the radius of the vortex.

runes.name: Inner Storm
runes.description: As long as your vortex is at the maximum stack count, you gain 5 Spirit per second.
runes.simpleDescription: Regain Spirit whenever the vortex is at its maximum.

runes.name: Master of Wind
runes.description: Increases the duration of the vortex to 10 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the duration of the vortex.

runes.name: Cyclone
runes.description: While your vortex is at the maximum stack count, every third hit spawns a lightning tornado that periodically electrocutes nearby enemies for 20% weapon damage as Lightning. Each spawned lightning tornado lasts 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: While the vortex is at its maximum, every third hit spawns a lightning tornado that electrocutes enemies.

skills.name: Sweeping Wind
skills.description:
Generate: 6 Spirit per attack

Strike a target for 100% weapon damage. Every third hit creates a vortex of air that surrounds you. The vortex of air lasts 5 seconds and deals 15% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards. This vortex effect can stack up to 3 times for a total of 45% weapon damage to nearby enemies.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 6 Spirit per attack

Unleash a flurry of punches that create a vortex that damages nearby enemies.

runes.name: Eye of the Storm
runes.description: Reduces the cost to 45 Spirit.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduces the Spirit cost of Cyclone Strike.

runes.name: Implosion
runes.description: Increases the distance enemies will be pulled to 34 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the distance enemies will be pulled towards you and increase the damage of the blast.

runes.name: Conflagration
runes.description: Changes the blast into an explosion of fire that causes affected enemies to be feared for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Change the blast into an fiery explosion that causes Fear.

runes.name: Wall of Wind
runes.description: After using Cyclone Strike gain a 20% chance to dodge attacks for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: After using Cyclone Strike gain a chance to Dodge attacks for a limited time.

runes.name: Soothing Breeze
runes.description: Cyclone Strike heals you and all allies within 24 yards for 4448 Life.
runes.simpleDescription: Cyclone Strike heals you and your allies.

skills.name: Cyclone Strike
skills.description:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Pull all enemies within 24 yards towards you followed by a furious blast of energy that deals 150% weapon damage as Holy.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Mystical force pulls nearby enemies towards you and blasts them.

runes.name: Overawe
runes.description: Increases Mantra strength so that enemies take 24% additional damage and 48% for the first 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases Mantra strength so that enemies take additional damage.

runes.name: Intimidation
runes.description: Enemies affected by Mantra of Conviction inflict 10% less damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies affected by Mantra of Conviction deal less damage.

runes.name: Dishearten
runes.description: Slows the movement of enemies within 20 yards by 30%.
runes.simpleDescription: Slows the movement of enemies.

runes.name: Reclamation
runes.description: You and your allies have up to a 30% chance to be healed for 534 - 652 Life when using melee attacks on an enemy under the effects of Mantra of Conviction.
runes.simpleDescription: You and your allies have a chance to be healed when using melee attacks under the effects of Mantra of Conviction.

runes.name: Submission
runes.description: Enemies affected by Mantra of Conviction take 12% weapon damage per second as Holy.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies affected by the Mantra of Conviction take Holy damage over time.

skills.name: Mantra of Conviction
skills.description:
Cost: 25 Spirit

Recite a Mantra that causes all enemies within 20 yards of you to take 12% additional damage. Lasts 3 minutes.

For 3 seconds after activation the effect is increased to 24% additional damage.

This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Spirit

Increases damage taken by nearby enemies.

Only one Mantra can be active at a time.

runes.name: Hands of Lightning
runes.description: Increase the number of hits in the second strike from 7 to 10.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the number of hits in the second strike.

runes.name: Blazing Fists
runes.description: Critical hits increase your attack speed and movement speed by 5% for 5 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical hits increase your attack and movement speeds.

runes.name: Fists of Fury
runes.description: Affected targets will take an additional 10% weapon damage per second as Holy for 5 seconds. Also enables the first hit to dash a short distance.
runes.simpleDescription: Affected targets take additional Holy damage and enables the first hit to dash a short distance.

runes.name: Spirited Salvo
runes.description: Every activation of the skill has a 15% chance to generate 15 additional Spirit.
runes.simpleDescription: Every use of this skill has a chance to generate additional Spirit.

runes.name: Windforce Flurry
runes.description: The third strike generates a wave of wind that deals 250% weapon damage as Physical to enemies directly ahead of you.
runes.simpleDescription: The third strike generates a wave of wind that damages enemies in your path.

skills.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
skills.description:
Generate: 6 Spirit per attack

A rapid series of punches strikes enemies for 125% weapon damage.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 6 Spirit per attack

Strike groups of enemies with a series of devastating punches.

runes.name: Water Ally
runes.description: Imbue the ally with the essence of water. The ally gains the ability to perform a wave attack that deals 120% of your weapon damage as Physical and slows the movement of affected targets by 30% for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Imbue the ally with the essence of water.

runes.name: Fire Ally
runes.description: Imbue the ally with the essence of fire. The ally gains the ability to fire kick for 80% weapon damage as Fire plus an additional 40% of your weapon damage per second as Fire for 2 seconds to all enemies in a straight line.
runes.simpleDescription: Imbue the ally with the essence of fire.

runes.name: Air Ally
runes.description: Imbue the ally with the essence of air. Every attack made by the ally has a 2% chance to generate 100 Spirit for you. In addition, the ally is surrounded in a torrent of wind that deals 10% of your weapon damage per second as Physical to all nearby enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: Imbue the ally with the essence of air that has a chance to regenerate Spirit.

runes.name: Eternal Ally
runes.description: Imbue the ally with the essence of life. When the ally dies it has a 50% chance to be reborn after 5 seconds. In addition, the physical damage of the ally's basic attack is increased to 44% of your weapon damage per swing.
runes.simpleDescription: Imbue the ally with the essence of life, which gives your ally a chance to be reborn when destroyed.

runes.name: Earth Ally
runes.description: Imbue the ally with the essence of earth. Maximum Life for you and the ally is increased by 10%. The ally also gains the ability to create a wave of earth, dealing 60% of your weapon damage as Physical to a single enemy and forcing that enemy to attack the ally for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Imbue the ally with the essence of earth which increase the maximum Life for you and the ally.

skills.name: Mystic Ally
skills.description:
Cost: 25 Spirit

Summon an elemental ally capable of engaging enemies in combat until it is destroyed. The ally deals 40% of your weapon damage as Physical per swing.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Spirit

Mystically summon an elemental ally to fight alongside you.
